00044 /* DBC_ASSERTS is intended to be set to 1 in debug builds */
00045 #if DBC_ASSERTS
00046 #include <sys.h>
00047 #define DBC_assert(c) if (!(c)) { \
00048         SYS_abort("Assertion Failed: file=%s, line=%d.\n", __FILE__, \
00049         __LINE__); }            
00051 #define DBC_require DBC_assert  
00052 #define DBC_ensure  DBC_assert  
00054 #else
00055 
00056 #define DBC_assert(c)   
00057 #define DBC_require(c)  
00058 #define DBC_ensure(c)   
00060 #endif
00061 
00062

00064 }
00065 #endif /* extern "C" */
